settings.title: Where are the CORE Pickleballs made?
settings.text: We developed these pickleballs in New Jersey, but we manufacture in China, as most of our competitors do. ¬†We would love to manufacture here in the USA, but we have yet to find the partner to do so, that can meet our quality and quantity necessities.

settings.title: Where can I buy CORE Pickleballs?
settings.text: On our store online, Walmart.com, Facebook Shop, and select retailers around the US. We plan to expand this rapidly as well. ¬†If you would like to purchase CORE pickleballs for resale, please send an email to¬†sales@corepickleballusa.com.

settings.title: Are CORE Pickleballs USAPA approved?
settings.text: Yes. our pickleballs are approved by the USAPA!

settings.title: How do I become a brand ambassador?
settings.text: We‚Äôre flattered! ¬†Fill out our form here to apply!¬†

settings.title: What does the 100% guarantee cover?
settings.text:
We guarantee that you are satisfied with your purchase! Please note that this is only valid for 3, 6, and 12 packs that are not discounted more than 10%.

If for some reason you are unsatisfied, please email us at customercare@corepickleballusa.com for a full refund.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: CORE designs premium, durable, USAPA-approved pickleball equipment to enable great experiences for every player, both on and off the court. Our products strike the ideal balance between professional play and pure fun.

settings.title: Our Story
settings.text1:
CORE Pickleball was founded with the mission to change the game from within by making pro-level, high-quality, and crack resistant equipment accessible to everyone.

We believe in making our own moments. That‚Äôs why we created the ball we wanted to most play with: a pickleball that plays fast, stays round, and cracks less at an affordable price. Turns out, we weren‚Äôt the only ones.
settings.text2:
CORE isn‚Äôt just a ball, it‚Äôs a grassroots community of athletes and enthusiasts coming together to create meaningful experiences through the sport we love. With the belief of friends, players, investors, advisors, and, most importantly, my supportive wife and three crazy children, we‚Äôve grown CORE Pickleball from a one-man start-up to distribution through the world‚Äôs largest retailers in less than one year.

Our company was built with passion in the USA. We tested countless prototypes first-hand on our home court until we could confidently deliver you the ideal pickleball experience: a moment to have more fun, play better, and play just One More Game.

settings.title: Disruption
settings.sub_title: Our change starts on the court, not in the boardroom.

settings.title: Passion
settings.sub_title: We share the love and purpose the sport gives us.

settings.title: Innovation
settings.sub_title: We‚Äôre always searching for fresh ways to grow the game.

settings.title: Accessibility
settings.sub_title: We believe everyone has the right to a great experience.

settings.title: Quality
settings.sub_title: Other balls tend to break. Ours hold up.

settings.title: Integrity
settings.sub_title: We believe in treating our community right. Always.

settings.title: Our Values
settings.text: Values are the difference between making change and making noise‚Äîand we‚Äôre here to change the game. That‚Äôs why we made these values the CORE of everything we do.

settings.title: Beyond the Court
settings.text: We love to give back to the sport that‚Äôs given us so much. CORE Pickleball donates equipment to several initiatives, including charitable tournaments, fundraisers, and Tonga‚Äôs efforts to expand the sport‚Äôs presence throughout the country.

settings.title: Our Products
settings.text: CORE designs durable, USAPA-approved pickleballs in the USA in order to enable premium experiences for every player‚Äîboth on and off the court. Our equipment strikes the ideal balance between fast play, perfect bounce, and pure fun.

settings.code:

settings.title: Gear Up For Your Next Match

settings.text: CORE designs premium, durable, USAPA-approved pickleball equipment to enable great experiences for every player, both on and off the court. Our products strike the ideal balance between professional play and pure fun.

settings.title: EXTRA DURABLE
settings.text: Play hard and play long with these reinforced outdoor pickleballs. Outlasting the competition you can play more games with fewer balls.

settings.title: TRUE BOUNCE
settings.text: Engineered for a consistent bounce game after game. These outdoor pickleballs will give you the confidence to trust your shot.

settings.title: TRUE FLIGHT
settings.text: We used precision drilling to optimize the placement of each hole on the ball. This improves airflow ensuring every shot flies straight and true.

settings.title: ALL WEATHER TESTED
settings.text: 40 precision drilled holes reduce the impact of wind on your shots. The ball is also weighed for extra wind resistance, making it perfect for outdoor games.
